definition.name: Online Experimentation Analysis
definition.description: Download the latest analysis results for an online experiment of an Azure App Configuration feature flag

inputs.name: subscription-id
inputs.description: The subscription ID of the Log Analytics workspace.

inputs.name: resource-group
inputs.description: The resource group of the Log Analytics workspace.

inputs.name: log-analytics-workspace
inputs.description: The name of the Log Analytics workspace.

inputs.name: app-configuration-feature-flag
inputs.description: The App Configuration feature flag of the experiment.

inputs.name: app-configuration-label
inputs.description: The App Configuration label. Default to no label.

inputs.name: metric-category-order
inputs.description: The analysis summary displays metrics grouped by their categories. This input specifies the display order of metric categories as a comma separated list. Unspecified categories are appended in alphabetical order, followed by the group of uncategorized metrics. Default: ''.

inputs.name: lookback-days
inputs.description: The number of previous days to search the Log Analytics workspace for the latest analysis results. Default: 30.

inputs.name: github-actions-summary
inputs.description: If the analysis summary should be displayed in the GitHub Action job summary. Default: true.

outputs.name: analysis-start-time
outputs.description: The start time of the analysis (ISO 8601 format).

outputs.name: analysis-end-time
outputs.description: The end time of the analysis (ISO 8601 format).

outputs.name: summary-md
outputs.description: Summary of the analysis results (GitHub Flavored Markdown format).

steps.name: Install Python dependencies
steps.run:
python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install -r ${{ github.action_path }}/requirements.txt

evidence.reasoning: The action focuses on downloading analysis results for online experiments, which falls under monitoring activities. Additionally, it outputs a summary in Markdown format, contributing to documentation.
